marilib.aircraft_data.aircraft_description module¶

Created on Thu Jan 24 23:22:21 2019

Module author: DRUOT Thierry

Module author: DELMIRO Thales

Module author: GALLARD Francois

class marilib.aircraft_data.aircraft_description.Aircraft(name=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Assembling all aircraft data branches

export_to_file(filename='Aircraft.ini', user_format=4, write_unit=True, write_om=False, write_detail=False)[source]¶

Build ini file: Data tree file.

Parameters

  • filename – Output file path - default value ‘Aircraft.ini’

  • user_format – parameters value format. Default value True or 4 for 4 decimals format. Disable option with False or -1.

  • write_unit – Boolean to write the unit after the variables value - default value False

  • write_om – Boolean to write the order of magnitude as a inline comment - default value False

  • write_detail – Boolean to write the variables description as a inline comment - default value False
